Row.Text: Select
OK
Wandering Wiseman
A wandering wiseman appears at {2} and offers to share his knowledge with you in exchange for some gold.
Hire him to the full extent of his services.
-200 + Era x 50[ICON_GOLD] Gold, +1 Great Scientist
Pay him to assist your advisors.
-100 + Era x 25[ICON_GOLD] Gold, random effect
"I have time nor money for this nonsense!"
Send the man away.
The wiseman leaves the city and is never seen again.
The wiseman agrees to stay.
The wiseman's teachings have positively influenced your government structure, adding to your culture.
The wiseman shares secret knowledge with your science advisor, giving you a free technology!
The wiseman's knowledge results in a technological breakthrough.
The wiseman's teachings bring prosperity to your citizens, starting a short [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE]Golden Age.
The "wiseman" was a fraud, and had nothing of value to teach...
Skilled Engineer
A skilled engineer comes to court, with a wish to oversee your cities' construction nationwide.
Tell him he has unlimited credit.
-125xEra[ICON_GOLD] Gold, construction hurried by 5 turns in all cities.
Give him a small share of our treasury to fund his work.
-75xEra[ICON_GOLD] Gold, construction hurried by 3 turns in all cities.
Let him see what he can do on his own.
Construction hurried by 1 turn in all cities.
Construction sped up in all your cities.
Construction sped up in all your cities.
Construction sped up in all your cities.
Local Artist
A promising Artist in {2} has caught the attention of the population. Perhaps it would be a good idea to approach him somehow?
"Send him a sum of gold, with a desire to see him create a truly grand work."
-150[ICON_GOLD] Gold, {2} expands 3 extra tiles.
"Set up a new atelier just for him."
-300[ICON_GOLD] Gold, culture building improved in {2}.
"I'll write him a letter, for moral support."
{2} expands 1 extra tile.
{2}'s borders have expanded.
{2} gained a new cultural building.
{2}'s borders have expanded.
New Spring
A new spring has been discovered in the desert near {2} and quickly it changes the area into an oasis.
"It's not a mirage, is it?"
A new oasis has appeared.
A spring creates a new oasis on the desert.
New Mineral Discovered
A new valuable mineral has been discovered in a mine near {2}.
"Mine, mine it all."
Iron, Gold, Gems, Silver, Coal, Aliminium or Uranium discovered near {2}.
A new source of Iron was found near {2}.
A new source of Gold was found near {2}.
A new source of Silver was found near {2}.
A new source of Gems was found near {2}.
A new source of Coal was found near {2}.
A new source of Aluminium was found near {2}.
A new source of Uranium was found near {2}.
Saplings Planted
Botanists near {2} have successfully planted new saplings from an exotic plant type.
"Green fingers, eh? Maybe we'll build a plantation around them."
New Bananas, Sugar, Wine, Incense, Silk, Cotton, Dye or Spices near {2}.
A new source of Bananas was found near {2}.
A new source of Dye was found near {2}.
A new source of Spices was found near {2}.
A new source of Silk was found near {2}.
A new source of Sugar was found near {2}.
A new source of Cotton was found near {2}.
A new source of Wine was found near {2}.
A new source of Incense was found near {2}.
Parrots
Citizens of {2} discovered some rare parrots in the near jungle. They are selling them as exotic pets.
"Can I have one?"
+2[ICON_GOLD] Gold yield in the tile.
Citizens of {2} now trade rare jungle parrots.
Fertile Soil
The fields near {2} are found to be exceptionally suitable for growing Wheat. This should improve our harvests there.
"This calls for a banquet."
Farmed now has a source of Wheat.
Agriculture near {2} has improved.
Holiday Resort
An atol group near {2} has become a very popular holiday destination. The tourism should enhance our revenues.
"Maybe we could go there next year."
+1[ICON_GOLD] Gold yield in the tile.
A new Holiday Island has been christened near {2}.
Quality Minerals
Ore from a mine at {2} appears to be of high density. The mine's production value has increased.
"Ore, is it?"
+1[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production yield in the tile.
Quality ore was found near {2}.
Tornado
A tornado has ravaged the countryside near {2}!
"Grab a broom."
The Improvement is destroyed.
A tornado caused havoc near {2}.
Meteor
A bright flash was seen in the skies, and moments later a meteor fell near {2}! The devestation is horrible.
"Activate the emergency program!"
Terrible, terrible damage.
A meteor devestated the lands of {2}.
Nuclear Meltdown
Sir! A horrible accident happened at the nuclear power plant of {2}! The explosion laid waste to the city, and the surrounding area will be irradiated for years!
"What a catastrophe!"
{2} is all but lost.
A nuclear disaster happened at {2}.
Nomads
You are approached by a group of wandering nomads. Tired of the wilderness, they seek to earn their keep in your empire.
"Give them wages and shelter, then send them to work."
Gain a Worker unit.
Nomads have joined you as Workers.
Golden Age
Due to your nation's extraordinary education system, an intellectual [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE]Golden Age has dawned!
"That's great news."
Starts a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE]Golden Age.
An intellectual Golden Age has begun.
Successful Investments
Recent investments have paid off. You receive a large amount of [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
"Show me the money!"
[ICON_GOLD]_[ICON_GOLD]
You gold reserves have increased.
Economic Collapse
Your country's economy took a nosedive. Consequently, your treasury has lowered percentually.
"Crap."
20-50% of current [ICON_GOLD] Gold lost.
You gold reserves have decreased.
Commercial Boom
One of your Trading Posts near {2} has developed into a booming center of commerce!
"This should improve business."
A new Customs House has replaced the Trading Post.
A Trading Post has improved into a Customs House near {2}.
Famous Special Improvement
A Special Improvement near {2} has gained national renown!
"The founder sure left a legacy!"
+3[ICON_CULTURE] Culture yield in the tile.
A tornado caused havoc near {2}.
Plague
A highly contagious and deadly virus has spread quickly throughout {2}, taking the lives of thousands of men and women!
"Burn the bodies! Don't let the plague spread any further."
Lose a number of Citizens.
A plague has struck {2}.
Border Growth
Pioneers from the infant town of {2} claimed a new plot on the outskirts of town.
"Raise the banner!"
The city claims an extra plot.
{2}'s borders have expanded.
Population Boom
{2} is enjoying an unexpected population boom!
"This will make the city grow rapidly."
The city will gain a few citizens.
{2} has had a population boom.
Rare Herbs
A new, rare type of medicinal herb was discovered in the bogs near {2}.
"Sell these herbs as curatives."
+1[ICON_FOOD] Food and +1[ICON_GOLD] Gold yield in the tile.
A tornado caused havoc near {2}.
Sickness
Your {3} suffers from a strange sickness. It doesn't look contagious, but you never know...
"That's bad!"
Your {3} suffers from a strange sickness.
Ancient Utopia
Archaeologists have found old scrolls detailing an ancient and utopic form of government. Some of these ideas might be applicable in today's world.
"Devise a new policy based on the ideas."
+1 Free Social Policy.
You gained a free policy.
City Assimilated
The citizens of {2} are very pleased with you as their leader, and consider themselves a true part of your empire!
"We welcome the people of {2}, and shall take an active hand in governing their city."
{2} will be a controlable, unoccupied city (instead of a Puppet).
{2} has lost its puppet state.
City is Unhappy
The citizens of {2} are openly opposing your leadership!
"Let them demonstrate, as long as they keep it peaceful."
{2} now counts as [ICON_OCCUPIED] Occupied, and will need a Courthouse to fight its extra [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness.
Citizens in {2} are demonstrating.
Tidal Wave
A massive tidal wave has hit the coastline of {2}, destroying all coastal buildings.
"We're lucky it wasn't a true tsunami."
Any Lighthouse, Harbor, or Seaport in the city are lost.
{2} was hit by a tidal wave.
Flash Flood
The river at {2} has crept out of its bed, washing away all riverside constructions.
"Bring me a damage report. And my rubber ducky."
Any Watermill or Hydro Plant in the city are lost.
{2} suffered from a flash flood.
Hurricane
Extreme weather near {2} has torn apart some fragile buildings.
"It's just material damage."
Any Windmill, Broadcast Tower or Solar Plant in the city are lost.
{2} suffered hurricane damage.
Monarchy
Your [ICON_CULTURE] Monarchical Government has made your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital City a very pleasant place to live. Immigrants move form the countryside to {2}, increasing its population.
"Roll out the red carpet."
[ICON_CAPITAL] {2}'s [ICON_CITIZEN] Population increased by 3.
{2} has new Citizens, due to your Monarchy.
Military Tradition
A[ICON_CULTURE] unit has acquired a new promotion through traditional training, improving their prowess in battle.
"Charge!"
Unit gained the Second Attack promotion.
Part of your army became more powerful through Military Tradition.
Meritocracy
Your [ICON_CULTURE] Meritocracic system has improved your national economy, increasing your [ICON_GOLD] reserves.
"What an investment!"
Each current non-puppet city gives you an amount of [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Your Meroticracy earned you additional gold.
Entrepeneur
A wealthy merchant has settled in {2}, constructing a new economic building for city-wide use.
"This will benefit the local economy."
A free Market/Bank/Stock Exchange was built.
{2} has a new Market.
{2} has a new Bank.
{2} has a new Stock Exchange.
Survival Training
Your {3} has started an exceptionally harsh survival training, which will increase the unit's experience.
"This should harden them some."
Unit will get + 15 XP.
Your {3} has earned additional XP.
